title: Trust Not in Libertarians
author: VD
content_html:
Libertarians serve Satan in as sure and as servile a manner as communists. And I say this as one who was once listed among the “top 25 libertarians on the Internet”. Satan was the first libertarian, as his “non serviam” was the first libertarian battle cry.

DISCUSS ON SG
